meanings.definition: Affected with or relating to phthisis, a wasting disease of the lungs.
meanings.sent1: The phthisical patient struggled to breathe due to the lung disease.
meanings.sent2: Her phthisical condition made it difficult for her to regain her strength.
meanings.sent3: Despite his phthisical lungs, he still managed to crack a joke and make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The phthisical state of the old building reflected its long history of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's description of the phthisical illness painted a grim picture of its effects on the body.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a gradual decline in health or strength.
meanings.sent1: The phthisical decline in his energy levels was noticeable to everyone around him.
meanings.sent2: As she grew older, her phthisical state became more apparent.
meanings.sent3: The phthisical weakening of the bridge's structure raised concerns about its safety.
meanings.sent4: His phthisical stamina could no longer keep up with the demands of his job.
meanings.sent5: The phthisical fading of the sunset marked the end of another day.
